overview: Guys Go Crazy Volume 6 presents over 100 guys going as far as they want, in the bar or right on the stage as hard-bodied stripper after stripper struts his stuff and turns this twink-filled party into a cock-fueled frenzy! Inspired by the action on the stage, dozens of the guests fall into each other's arms and start dancing, stripping, sucking, and fucking, a fabulous and fun once-in-a-lifetime chance to just let go, hook up with anyone, and be part of history, Guys Go Crazy style!
title: Guys Go Crazy 6: Disco Decadence
